channel.title: RSPS - Messyscape - 317
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i895.photobucket.com/albums/ac160/alexman122/MessyScapeLogo-1.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Welcome to Messyscape Current Server![/size][/center]
[center] Project: Making the server look alike runescape but also more of rsps as well.. If that makes sence :)[/center]
[center] History of messyscape: We have been on and off coding Messyscape since 2008 - 2012 so that is round about 4 years of learning java Language. I must say the community that we have been growing has been exelent, Made new staff and quited for what ever reason, then along comes another Co owner.. So yeah, Our latest co owner is still around, His user is Bunny. Also i want to thank EVOLUTION-X, the classic server that made me learn most my codes.. And my first server coding was allstar.. But now im currently working from blank source and client, This is bunny video when we was attempting to launch on vps: [/center]
[center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hgB1FQXJAQ&feature=player_embedded[/youtube][/center]
So on with my community :) Owners: (me) - Alex | Bunny Coders: Matt Admin: bug finders: player Moderators:
Yeah.. there only 3 staff at the mo because no other people on 2008-2010 had skype :/ but bring on the ol messyscape!!!
So what have we got :D!
Red/green
attack / Strength / Defence / HP (working) (same with drops) (yell system) (mod crowns) Range Mage Prayer Agility Thieving Mining Smithing Herbloring Runecrafting Farming Fishing Cooking Fletching Crafting
Minigames:
Latest weapons:
This will be updated by pictures.. :)
So to proof its an empty source: Client folder: [IMG]http://i895.photobucket.com/albums/ac160/alexman122/client.png[/img]
The Client It self: (working combat system) [center][IMG]http://i895.photobucket.com/albums/ac160/alexman122/combat.png[/img][/center]
thieving works 100% [IMG]http://i1210.photobucket.com/albums/cc403/publicenemies/da.png[/img]
This will be updated everytime i make an update ^_^ bear in mind i may be reposting on to looking for recruitment :x i can't really do ALL of this on my own :/ so it's a maybe..
_________________________________ Abstract

item.title: RSPS - Messyscape - 317
item.dc:creator: @Abstract317 Abstract317
item.description:
@Abstract317 wrote:

aha Messyscape ftw name, i kinda took it from mezzyscape i guess… but added ss >.>
i hope there no copyright

item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

I see ur using that 2006 loading 2012 source … I liek it but ur name Grr… Funny thing is I’ve been working on RSPS from 2008 too…

Read full topic
